Package index

All functions

bathy_to_hypso()
Convert bathymetry raster to hypsograph
calc_bathy_diff()
Calculate the difference between observed and predicted bathymetry
calculate_lake_volume()
Calculate the volume of a lake using bathymetry data or a hypsograph
check_for_islands()
Check for islands in a set of polygons
dem_to_hypsograph()
Extend a hypsograph from a DEM
estimate_bathymetry()
Estimate bathymetry from a shoreline polygon using distance transformation.
generate_depth_points()
Generate depth points for interpolation
get_contours()
Get contours from a bathymetric raster
get_depths()
Get depths for hypsograph or contours
get_lake_depth()
Get Lake Depth from Bathymetry Raster This function calculates the lake depth from a bathymetric raster.
get_lake_surface_elevation()
Get lake surface elevation from DEM
get_shoreline()
Get the shoreline from a bathymetric raster
interpolate_points()
Interpolate point depth data to a raster
merge_bathy_dem()
Merge lake bathymetry raster with a DEM raster
model_layer_structure
Reference data frame for model layer structure.
plot_raster_3d()
Plot a 3D raster
rasterise_bathy()
Generate depth points for interpolation
tm_dem_bath()
Draw a elevation map with bathymetry and surrounding topography
